answerText: The Cloud Messenger [or Meghaduta][10] The Cloud Messenger was written by this Sanskrit poet who also wrote the play The Recognition of Shakuntala.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 1 | 17 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This work recounts how a Yaksha persuades the title character to journey to Alaka. For 10 points each: [10] Name this 111-stanza work of Sanskrit poetry, which describes how the title figure helps to communicate between a man and his wife.
